mapper.select: SELECT (select count(1) from log_login) as total, (select count(1) from log_login where date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')) as today, (select count(1) from log_login where result = 1 ) as success, (select count(1) from log_login where result = 0 ) as error FROM DUAL
